name: Real Time Messenger Web Application
description: I developed a real-time messenger web application based on a tutorial from YouTube. By implementing real-time functionality using technologies like Pusher.js and Next.js, I enabled instant messaging and live updates for a dynamic user experience. Throughout the project, I actively engaged with the tutorial content, experimenting with customizations and troubleshooting any challenges, resulting in a functional and user-friendly messaging application.

name: Web Portolio
description: Developed a personal website while learning TypeScript. I enabled efficient data management and personalized content delivery. I created a user-centric and visually compelling digital experience that reflects client's personal brand and aspirations.

name: Wedding Invitation
description: Designed and developed a captivating wedding invitation website from scratch, showcasing my skills in both web design and front-end development. I crafted a seamless user interface, ensuring an intuitive experience across devices.
